thread.title: 49ers’ woes start at the top of the organization
thread.title_full: 49ers’ woes start at the top of the organization - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ann Killion
title: 49ers’ woes start at the top of the organization
text:
Photo: Rick Scuteri, Associated Press San Francisco 49ers inside linebacker NaVorro Bowman (53) against the Arizona Cardinals during the first half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Sept. 27, 2015, in Glendale, Ariz. (AP Photo/Rick Scuteri) San Francisco 49ers inside linebacker NaVorro Bowman (53) against...
The 49ers have surpassed themselves in at least one category this season: The level of antipathy and anger directed at CEO Jed York is greater than even what his father faced a decade ago. San Francisco 49ers inside linebacker NaVorro Bowman (53) against the Arizona Cardinals during the first half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Sept. 27, 2015, in Glendale, Ariz. (AP Photo/Rick Scuteri) San Francisco 49ers inside linebacker NaVorro Bowman (53) against...
The 49ers have surpassed themselves in at least one category this season: The level of antipathy and anger directed at CEO Jed York is greater than even what his father faced a decade ago.
